name: Mementos (emiree_draws)
description:
My Twine game, Mementos, takes place in the mindscape and it follows Rory, a person who awakes from a bed in a barren bedroom. As they investigate their surroundings, they approach a door, where they are transported to a past memory. 

In each memory, Rory meets a new person that shapes their identity and they will keep a memento, which they will place into the barren room, transforming it to have more color and personality. There are three different memories, each exploring a different aspect of their life.

The main theoretical question driving my project is: What imprints do we leave on others? How do these experiences shape us into who we are today?
